validator.arg: (cfValues['EC Type']?.value == 'Standard EC' && cfValues['Reason for change']?.value != 'Cost reduction for supplier change' && cfValues['Reason for change']?.value != 'Cost reduction for project change') || cfValues['EC Type']?.value == 'Electronic Components EC' || (cfValues['EC Type']?.value != 'Standard EC' && (cfValues['Reason for change']?.value == 'Cost reduction for supplier change' || cfValues['Reason for change']?.value == 'Cost reduction for project change'))

Error: you cannot select 'Cost reduction' reason for change if you select to create a Standard EC, otherwise, if you select a CR issue you cannot select a reason for change different from 'Cost Reduction'
